title: 监控告警处理
situation: A monitoring alert fired. You're discussing whether it's a real incident or a false positive.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 刚收到告警，CPU使用率超过百分之九十，持续了两分钟。
turns.pinyin: Gāng shōudào gàojǐng, CPU shǐyòng lǜ chāoguò bǎi fēn zhī jiǔshí, chíxù le liǎng fēnzhōng.
turns.translation: Just got an alert — CPU usage over 90% for two minutes.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 查一下是不是有慢查询，或者某个job跑爆了。
turns.pinyin: Chá yīxià shì bu shì yǒu màn cháxún, huòzhě mǒu ge job pǎo bào le.
turns.translation: Check if there are slow queries or if some job went haywire.
suggestions: 查一下是不是有慢查询，或者某个job跑爆了。
看一下慢查询和定时任务。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: Grafana上看，是数据库连接池满了。
turns.pinyin: Grafana shàng kàn, shì shùjùkù liánjiē chí mǎn le.
turns.translation: From Grafana, it looks like the DB connection pool is exhausted.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 可能是连接泄漏，先扩容连接池顶一下，同时排查没有正确close的连接。
turns.pinyin: Kěnéng shì liánjiē xièlòu, xiān kuò róng liánjiē chí dǐng yīxià, tóngshí páichá méiyǒu zhèngquè close de liánjiē.
turns.translation: Could be a connection leak. Temporarily increase pool size, and hunt for connections that aren't properly closed.
suggestions: 可能是连接泄漏，先扩容连接池顶一下，同时排查没有正确close的连接。
